title: Leveraging Open Compensation Token License (OCTL) as an Alternative to Pure Open Source (Capitalism)
description: Explore the potential of the Open Compensation Token License (OCTL) as a sustainable and inclusive alternative to traditional open source capitalism. Learn how OCTL empowers independent developers, provides equitable opportunities for global contributors, and aligns compensation with the true value and impact of software contributions.
keywords: Open Compensation Token License, OCTL, open source capitalism, tokenized royalties, independent developers, global contributors, fair compensation, inclusive economic model, open source social market economy
